user_create_description: Choose a username and a PIN to get started.
user_error_username_invalid: Only letters, numbers, hyphens and underscores.
settings_media_description: Configure the folders to scan for media files (movies, series, etc.).
settings_media_no_folders: No folders configured yet. Add a folder to start scanning.
settings_media_folder_exists: This folder is already in the list.
settings_media_folder_invalid: The selected folder does not exist.
settings_scan_on_startup_description: Automatically scan media folders when the application starts.
settings_live_scan_description: Automatically detect changes in media folders in real time.
settings_metadata_description: Configure metadata providers to automatically download movie information, posters, and backdrops. Providers are queried in the order shown below.
settings_metadata_no_providers: Enable at least one provider and enter its API key to fetch metadata.
settings_metadata_help: How to get an API key
settings_metadata_help_title: How to get your API key
settings_metadata_help_tmdb_step1: Create a free account on themoviedb.org.
settings_metadata_help_tmdb_step4: Copy the API Key (v3 auth) and paste it here.
settings_metadata_help_omdb_step1: Go to omdbapi.com and click 'API Key'.
settings_metadata_help_omdb_step3: Enter your email, receive your key, and paste it here.
settings_metadata_help_tmdb_builtin: A built-in API key is included. TMDB works out of the box — no setup needed. If you prefer using your own key (e.g. for heavy usage), follow the steps below.
settings_metadata_cache_description: Metadata will be refreshed automatically after this period.
settings_logs_description: Log files older than this period will be automatically deleted.
account_profile_description: Manage your profile information and avatar.
account_avatar_hint: JPG, PNG or WebP. Max 5 MB.
account_pin_required: Enter your current PIN to confirm.
connect_description: Connect with other Popcorn Hero users to share your media library peer-to-peer.
connect_generate_description: Generate a connection code and share it with a friend so they can connect to you.
connect_generate_placeholder: Your connection code will appear here…
connect_join_description: Paste the connection code received from another user to connect.
connect_peers_empty: No peers connected yet. Share your code or join a peer to get started.
